Text: Make a joyful noise to the LORD, all the earth.
Context: The psalmist calls for all people on earth to joyfully acknowledge God.

Text: Serve the LORD with gladness; come before Him with joyful songs.
Context: The psalm encourages worship and service to God with a joyful heart.

Text: Know that the LORD is God. It is He who made us, and we are His; we are His people, and the sheep of His pasture.
Context: Affirmation of God as Creator and sustainer; a relationship is described between God and His followers.

Text: Enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise; give thanks to Him and bless His name.
Context: The verse instructs to enter God’s presence with an attitude of gratitude and praise.

Text: For the LORD is good, and His loving devotion endures forever; His faithfulness continues to all generations.
Context: A declaration of God‘s enduring goodness, love, and faithfulness to all generations.
